worm.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a long thin creature with no bones and no legs that lives in soil
worm.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: the young form of an insect, which looks like a short worm
worm.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: someone who you do not like or respect
worm.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: a type of computer virus that can make copies of itself and destroy information on computers that are connected to each other
worm.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to give an animal medicine in order to remove parasites that live inside it
worm.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: a CD on which information can be stored only once, but seen or used many times
